files.patch: @@ -2149,3 +2149,4 @@ - * Returns true if the button icon for present button state - * is an instance of ImageIcon and the image it contains is same as the - * passed in Image, false otherwise. + * If the button icon for present button state is either null + * or not an ImageIcon with an Image equal to the + * passed in Image, return false; Otherwise it + * will delegate to the super-class.

@@ -877,3 +877,4 @@ - * Returns true if the label icon for present label state - * is an instance of ImageIcon and the image it contains is same as the - * passed in Image, false otherwise. + * If the component is not showing or either the icon or disabled + * icon is not an ImageIcon with an Image + * equal to the passed in Image, return false; + * Otherwise it will delegate to the super-class.
